ja531:6.1: Abbhūti → abbhū hi (bj); abhūti (sya1ed, sya2ed); abbhu hi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:6.4: akantaṃ kantumicchasi → akanto kantamicchasi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:20.1: nūnāyaṃ sā → nūna ayaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja531:40.3: lambissati → lambahīti (pts-vp-pli1) | siṅgālo → sigālo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:41.4: Siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhissanti → siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhayanti (bj); sigālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhayanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); gayhā vako gacchati yenakāmaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:49.1: Sace ca ajja → tvaṃ amma (bj); saceva ajja (sya1ed, sya2ed); tvaṃ ajja (pts-vp-pli1) | dhāresi → vāresi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:51.1: ca sisati → asso hasisati (bj); asso hasiyati (sya1ed, sya2ed); asso ca siṃsati (pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:54.4: sabbe vadhissati → yo no dukkhā pamocaye (bj); yo ne sabbe vadhissati (sya1ed, sya2ed); so no sabbe vadhissatīti (pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:55.2: Andhabālā pabhāsasi → ādu bālāva bhāsasi (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja531:64.2: duhanti vīsatiṃ → duyhanti vīsati (bj, pts-vp-pli1); dūhanti vīsati (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja531:65.4: na naṃ → na taṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | akkhāsidhāgataṃ → akkhāsi āgataṃ (bj); akkhāsi māgataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja531:75.2: pahu → bahuṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr); bahu (sya1ed, sya2ed) | titikkhisaṃ → titikkhissaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
